snippet: The vice president’s problems began Thursday when he declared that the biggest problem in dealing with Syria and the rise of the Islamic State was America’s allies in the region.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr is trying to ocnnect with Saudi leaders to apologize for and clarify comment he made suggesting that Saudi Arabia backed Al Qaeda or other extremist groups in Syria; Biden has apologized to officials from Turkey and United Arab Emirates.
lead_paragraph: The vice president’s problems began Thursday when he declared that the biggest problem in dealing with Syria and the rise of the Islamic State was America’s allies in the region.

headline.main: Saudis Are Next on Biden’s Mideast Apology List After Harvard Remarks
headline.print_headline: Saudis Are Next on Biden’s Mideast Apology List After Harvard Remarks
